changelog:
- Updated LegionOS to 1.7
- Clear all notif change a bit and fix leftover glitch
- Android Q style Wifi icons (Evolution X version)
- Add Back manage notif to statusbar footer
-  Settings: Changes from Android Q Beta 4 with various icons
- Change default wallpaper
- Performance improvements
-  Telephony: Stop using rssnr, it falsly shows wrong signal bars
- Add Smart Charging
- SystemUI: Protect against terrible music players
- base: Import Android Q animations
- Move Q animation to custom animations
- Q seekbar: Stable seek bar positioning
- core: os: Build: Don't fail consistency check if vendor is mismatched
 Add 18 more QS styles
